name: R4-goal-status-for-R3
title: Cross-version VS for R4.GoalLifecycleStatus for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/goal-status|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R3. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R4 to R3.
